mean_en: long narrow pieces of cloth, leather, etc. for holding trousers/pants up. They are fastened to the top of the trousers/pants at the front and back and passed over the shoulders.
sentence: The boy in a white tank top is pulling on his suspenders.
sentence_trans: 这个穿白背心的男孩在扯他的背带。
word_etyma: sus在…下面 + pend挂 + er名词后缀 → 悬挂物
